title: [The Slope, Forest Trail]
description: Gnarled tree branches seem to grasp lower in a vain attempt to reach the trail.  The trees themselves seem to thicken, reaching ever higher in an effort to reach the sky.  The brush on the forest floor impedes any sight beyond the next turn in the trail.

Gnarled tree branches seem to grasp lower in a vain attempt to reach the trail.  The trees themselves seem to thicken, reaching ever higher in an effort to reach the sun.  The brush on the forest floor impedes any sight beyond the next turn in the trail.
